description: WYGIWYH (What You Get Is What You Have) is a powerful, principles-first finance tracker designed for people who prefer a no-budget, straightforward approach to managing their money. Features multi-currency support, customizable transactions, built-in dollar-cost averaging tracker, and API automation.
